docs.title: Chipp
docs.text:
PK Combos

Difficulty is considered without the IAD c.Geki (956214K) input. Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

c.S 5K 2P 2PP c.S | Everywhere Extreme 956214K > 66 > c.S > 2H > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 266

Fullscreen combo route is a frameperfect, dash in for 6f or 7f if hit crouching, 2H into Hochifu can't be delayed, same with Zekkei into 546P~K. The corner route is less hard, dash a tiny bit, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 5K | Everywhere Medium 956214K > 66 > 5K > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 253 / 251

Dash a tiny bit forward so Zekkei will hit Chipp, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2P | Everywhere Medium 956214K > 66 > 2P > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 245 / 246

Fullscreen, dash a tiny bit forward, no delay Zekkei. For the corner route, you want to dash in deep, no delay Zekkei.The 1-Hit route only works in the corner, here, you want to dash a tiny bit forward as well, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2PP | Everywhere Medium-Hard 956214K > 66 > 2PP > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 224 / 229

Fullscreen, dash in deep, just before it would OTG, no delay Zekkei. For the corner route, you want to dash in deep, no delay Zekkei.Fullscreen 1-Hit, dash in a bit, but not too deepm, no delay Zekkei. Corner 1-Hit, dash in deep, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag.

Difficulty is considered without the Kara c.Geki (236S214KK) input. Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

c.S 6P(1) 6K(1) 2S 5K 2H(1) 5K 2P 2PP c.S | Everywhere Medium 236S214KK > 66 > c.S > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 246 / 254

Fullscreen 2-Hit does not work. For the corner route, dash in deep, no delay Zekkei. Fullscreen and corner 1-Hit, dash in and hit Chipp at the highest moment after Geki hit ,no delay Zekkei.Note: You can also go for 2S starter instead, but it will deal less damage.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 6P(1) | Everywhere Extreme 236S214KK > 66 > 6P(1) > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 242

Fullscreen, very specific spacing and a 6f dash required for it to work, no delay Zekkei. For the corner route, hit 6P(1) fast, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 6K(1) | Everywhere Medium 236S214KK > 66 > 6K(1) > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 237 / 243

Corner, dash in a bit so Chipp will be hit lower, no delay Zekkei.Fullscreen and corner 1-Hit, dash in a bit, hitting Chipp at the highest point after the Geki hit, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2S 5K 2H(1) | Everywhere Medium-Hard 236S214KK > 66 > 2S > 5K > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 238

Fullscreen, just before OTG, no delay Zekkei. Dash in deep, no delay Zekkei

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 5K | Everywhere Medium 236S214KK > 66 > 5K > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 233 / 239

Quick dash after the Geki hit, but not too far in, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2P | Everywhere Medium 236S214KK > 66 > 2P > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 228 / 233

Fullscreen, dash in a bit, position yourself at his feet, no delay Zekkei. For the corner route, just dash in a bit, no delay Zekkei. Fullscreen and corner 1-Hit, hit Chipp at his highest point after Geki, microdash might be needed, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2PP | Everywhere Medium-Hard 236S214KK > 66 > 2P > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 215 / 217

Fullscreen, dash in deep but position yourself not too far, no delay Zekkei. For the corner route, dash in deep, no delay Zekkei. Fullscreen and corner 1-Hit, dash in a bit, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag.

Difficulty is considered without the IAD Geki (956214K) input. Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

f.S c.S 2S 5K 2P f.S | Everywhere Medium-Hard 956214K > 66 > f.S > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 272

Dash momentum is required to hit f.S and zekkei, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. c.S | Everywhere Hard 956214K > 66 > c.S > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 272 / 269

Fullscreen 2-Hit is a frame perfect, dash 7f, delay Zekkei by 2f. Corner, dash in a bit, no delay Zekkei.Fullscreen 1-Hit, close Geki hit, dash in a bit, if far Geki hit, dash in more, no delay Zekkei. Corner 1-Hit, microdash, no delay Zekkei. Fullscreen 2-Hit is not worth it, all the other routes are duable. Cause of that I won't set the difficulty to extreme.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2S | Everywhere Medium-Hard 956214K > 66 > 2S > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 270

Corner, dash in a bit, no delay Zekkei.Fullscreen 1-Hit, close Geki needed, 6f dash, no delay Zekkei, frame perfect. Corner 1-Hit, microdash, no delay Zekkei. Fullscreen 1-Hit is Extreme difficulty.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 5K | Everywhere Medium-Hard 956214K > 66 > 5K > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 258 / 259

Fullscreen, only works if the IAD Geki is close as you need to hit Chipp when hes at the highest point from Geki, no delay Zekkei. Corner, dash in a bit, no delay Zekkei.Fullscreen 1-Hit, hit 5K fast but dash in deep enough so Zekkei will hit Chipp, no delay Zekkei.Corner 1-Hit, Microdash, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2PP | Everywhere Medium-Hard 956214K > 66 > 2PP > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 230 / 233

Both corner, dash in a bit, no delay Zekkei. Fullscreen 1-Hit, requires specific spacing, close Geki hit, 8f microdash, no delay Zekkei.2P works as well with the same routing.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag.

Difficulty is considered without the Hyappo Shinshou (236S~S) input. Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

c.S f.S 2H(1) c.S 2S 2H(1) 6K(1) 2S 5K 2H(1) 6P 2PP c.S f.S 2H(1) | Everywhere Easy 236S~S > 66 > c.S > f.S > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 248

No delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. c.S 2S 2H(1) | Everywhere Easy 236S~S > 66 > c.S > 2S > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 245

No delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 6K(1) | Corner Medium 236S~S > 66 > 6K(1) > 2H > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 237

Corner only, hit Chipp before he reaches the ground, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2S 5K 2H(1) | Everywhere Medium 236S~S > 66 > 2S > 5K > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 235

Fullscreen, no delay Zekkei. Corner, either hit Chipp very quickly or late, no delay Zekkei. This route also works with 5K > 2S > 2H(1) instead. It will also deal the same amount of damage.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 6P | Everywhere Medium 236S~S > 66 > 6P > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 235

Fullscreen, no delay Zekkei. Corner, dash in a bit, otherwise the second hit of 6P won't hit, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2PP | Everywhere Medium 236S~S > 66 > 2PP > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 214 / 216

Fullscreen and corner, no delay Zekkei. Corner 1-Hit, Hit Chipp before he reaches the ground, but also delay it a bit, otherwise the second 2P won't hit, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag.

Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

c.S 2S 2H(1) 2S 5K 2H(1) 2P 2K 2PP c.S 2S 2H(1) | Everywhere Medium 4 / 6HS > RRC > 22X > c.S > 2S > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage:

No delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2S 5K 2H(1) | Everywhere Medium 4 / 6HS > RRC > 22X > 5K > 2S > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 231

No delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2P | Everywhere Medium 4 / 6HS > RRC > 22X > 2P > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 227

Fullscreen 1-Hit, delay 236S to ~S a bit, making Jam move a bit further letting Chipp stay in the corner, no delay Zekkei. Corner 1-Hit, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2K | Everywhere Very Hard 4 / 6HS > RRC > 22X > 2K > 2H > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 224

You're not allowed to delay anything. If anything delayed by 1f or more, Chipp can tech out.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2PP | Everywhere Medium 4 / 6HS > RRC > 22X > 2P > 2H > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 209

Delay 2PP a tiny bit, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag.

Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

j.PKS j.PPKS j.PKS | Everywhere Medium f.S > 956 > j.PKS > 2H > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > (Card) / 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 213 / 244

delay j.P,K,S, no delay Zekkei. Corner route has the ability to extend with 2S.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. j.PPKS | Everywhere Medium f.S > 956 > j.PPKS > 2H > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 22X

Damage: 213 / 244

No delay Zekkei. Card charge adviced, in case of extension, use f.S into TK Ryuujin.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag.

Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

c.S f.S 2H(1) c.S > 2S > 2H(1) c.S 2S 6K(1) 2S 5K 2H(1) 5K 2P 2PP c.S f.S 2H(1) | Everywhere Medium 2D > RRC > 66 > c.S > f.S > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 228

Fullscreen and corner 1-Hit, dash in quite a bit so he stays in the corner, no delay Zekkei. Corner 1-Hit, dash in a bit, but not too much, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. c.S 2S 2H(1) | Everywhere Medium 2D > RRC > 66 > c.S > 2S 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 225

Fullscreen and corner 1-Hit, dash until Chipp is low enough for 2S to hit, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. c.S | Everywhere Medium 2D > RRC > 66 > c.S > 2H > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 225

Fullscreen, dash until his feet go downwards, no delay Zekkei. Corner, hit c.S as fast as possible, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2S | Everywhere Medium 2D > RRC > 66 > c.S > 2H > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 224

Fullscreen, dash in a bit but not too far, you want to hit Chipp at his feet so you hit his hurtbox and will stay in the corner, no delay Zekkei. Corner, dash in a bit so double hit will work.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 6K(1) | Everywhere Easy 2D > RRC > 66 > 6K(1) > 2H > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 216

Fullscreen and corner, dash in a tiny bit, hit Chipp as soon as possible, no delay Zekkei. Fullscreen will throw Chipp the otherway.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2S 5K 2H(1) | Everywhere Medium 2D > RRC > 66 > 2S > 5K > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 214

Fullscreen and corner, dash in a bit, but not too much, no delay Zekkei. Fullscreen will throw Chipp the otherway.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 5K | Everywhere Medium 2D > RRC > 66 > 5K > 2H > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 214

Fullscreen, dash in a bit, but not too much so you will hit Chipp's feet, no delay Zekkei. Corner, dash in a bit, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2P | Everywhere Medium 2D > RRC > 66 > 2P > 2H > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 207

Fullscreen and corner, hit 2P as soon as possible, no delay Zekkei.Fullscreen will throw Chipp the other way.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2PP | Everywhere Medium 2D > RRC > 66 > 2PP > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 186 / 190

Fullscreen, dash in quite a bit so Chipp stays in the corner, no delay Zekkei.Corner, dash in a bit, but not too far, no delay Zekkei.Fullscreen 1-Hit, can't dash in too deep, will get thrown the other way.Corner 1-hit, hit Chipp as soon as possible, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag.

Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

5P c.S 5P c.S | Corner Very Hard 632146HS > 5P > c.S > 2HS > 546P~K > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

No delay Zekkei

docs.title: Elphelt
docs.text:
Difficulty is considered without the IAD Geki (956214K) input. Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

5K 5K | Corner only Extreme 956214K > 546(whiff) > 5K > 2H(1) > 546 dl P~K > dl 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Frame perfect combo on Elphelt with IAD Geki combo starter. Only works in the corner. You have to delay IAD Geki enough, otherwise Elphelt will be too low and Zekkei will connect on the first frame. Elphelt will be too high and the Puff Puff will whiff. After the 546(whiff) into the 5K, input 5K as 4K to be on time. You must delay the 546~P by 1, 2 or 3 frames. If you don't delay it or delay by 4f, it will connect on first frame. For the PuffPuff, there must a delay for the ~S from 236S by at least 2 frames. You can delay it by a maximum of 4. This makes it a 3f timing Thanks to Kkots for finding this route

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag.

docs.title: Jam Xrd Guide
docs.text:
Welcome to Rage's Jam Xrd Guide! Light mode is broken, please switch to dark mode through clicking on the light bulb in the right upper corner. Firefox isn't able to load local video's properly, use the YouTube video or switch to a different webbrowser.

This doc is SIP.

To do: - Finish combos pages - Matchup page - Fix the light mode issue in the combo widgets - An easier way to access the character info/combos - New things - If you're in the PK List page, you can't access the character pages easily

docs.title: Johnny
docs.text:
PK Combos

Difficulty is considered without the IAD c.Geki (956214K) input. Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

c.S f.S 2H(1) c.S 2S c.S 2S 2H(1) 6K(1) 5K 2S 5K 2H 2P 2PP c.S f.S 2H(1) | Everywhere Medium 956214K > c.S > f.S > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 219

Most damaging combo route without spending other resources 66 after the 956214K is optional and only required if you're too far away.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. c.S | Everywhere Easy 956214K > c.S > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 217

Easy c.S route, you can do both 2H hits or go for (1) hit. Timings may vary if you go for double or (1) 2H hit into 546P~K 66 after the 956214K is optional and only required if you're too far away.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2S | Everywhere Easy 956214K > 2S > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 217

Easy 2S route, you can do both 2H hits or go for (1) hit. Timings may vary if you go for double or (1) 2H hit into 546P~K 66 after the 956214K is optional and only required if you're too far away.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. c.S 2S 2H(1) | Everywhere Easy 956214K > c.S > 2S > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 216

Common c.S > 2S > 2H(1) route. Works on Johnny as well. 66 after the 956214K is optional and only required if you're too far away.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 6K(1) | Everywhere Easy 956214K > 6K(1) > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 208

Easy 6K(1) route, you can do both 2H hits or go for (1) hit. Timings may vary if you go for double or (1) 2H hit into 546P~K 66 after the 956214K is optional and only required if you're too far away.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 5K | Everywhere Easy 956214K > 5K > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 205

Easy 5K route, you can do both 2H hits or go for (1) hit. Timings may vary if you go for double or (1) 2H hit into 546P~K 66 after the 956214K is optional and only required if you're too far away.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2S 5K 2H(1) | Everywhere Hard 956214K > 2S > 5K > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 204

This is a bit of a harder combo as the dash after the IAD can be a bit tight to land 2S afterwards.Less hard if you hit the opponent crounching.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2P | Everywhere Easy 956214K > 2P > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 199

Easy 2P route, you can do both 2H hits or go for (1) hit. Timings may vary if you go for double or (1) 2H hit into 546P~K 66 after the 956214K is optional and only required if you're too far away.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2PP | Everywhere Easy 956214K > 2PP > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 178 / 181

Easy 2PP route, you can do both 2H hits or go for (1) hit. Timings may vary if you go for double or (1) 2H hit into 546P~K 66 after the 956214K is optional and only required if you're too far away. YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag.

Difficulty is considered without the Kara c.Geki (236S214KK) input. Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

Difficulty is considered without the IAD Geki (956214K) input. Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

f.S c.S f.S 2H(1) c.S c.S 2S 2H(1) 2S 6K(1) 5K 2S 5K 2H(1) 2P 2PP f.S | Everywhere Hard 956214K > f.S > 2H > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 225

This combo is hard not cause of the execution but because of the way you have to hit f.S. Most of the time, you will get c.S instead cause you're too close. Be too far away and Zekkei will whiff. If you happen to get c.S, you can go for other c.S starter routes instead. No delay for Zekkei is required, instead, you need to delay 236S~S a bit so Jam will go a little bit more forward to catch Johnny as he will be too far away.

Note: There are many other CH Puff routes for Johnny. I may add them later, but for now, I added the most common routes.Difficulty is considered without the Hyappo Shinshou (236S~S) input. Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

c.S f.S 2H(1) c.S 2S 2H(1) 2S c.S 6K(1) 2S 5K 2H 5K 2P 2PP c.S f.S 2H(1) | Everywhere Medium 236S~S > 66 > c.S > f.S > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 200

Most damaging CH Puff Route. Slight delay of Zekkei is needed to catch Johnny.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. c.S 2S 2H(1) | Everywhere Medium 236S~S > 66 > c.S > 2S > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 198

Slight delay of Zekkei is needed to catch Johnny. f.S instead of c.S is possible and follows the same route.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2S | Everywhere Medium 236S~S > 66 > 2S > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 198

Slight delay of Zekkei is needed to catch Johnny. f.S instead of c.S is possible and follows the same route.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. c.S | Everywhere Medium 236S~S > 66 > c.S > 2H > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 196

Most steady route, works always.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 6K(1) | Everywhere Medium 236S~S > 66 > 6K(1) > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 188 / 190

Fullscreen, hard timing but durable, dash in deep.For the corner, hit Johnny close. For corner 1-Hit, when hitting CH 236S~S, you have to hit Johnny before he reaches the ground for the 1-Hit route to work.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2S 5K 2H | Everywhere Medium 236S~S > 66 > 2S > 5K > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 186 / 188

Always works, needs a delay Zekkei for it to work.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 5K | Everywhere Medium 236S~S > 66 > 5K > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 185 / 187

When hitting CH 236S~S from midscreen, you have to dash in really deep for the 5K double hit to work. For the corner route, both double and 1-Hit need to be done before Johnny hits the ground.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2P | Everywhere Medium-Hard 236S~S > 66 > 2P > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 181 / 183

For midscreen, 2P needs to be spaced right above Johnny's feet so Zekkei will land into his hurtbox. For the corner route, you need to dash in deep, but not too deep. Seems not possible after certain frames.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2PP | Everywhere Medium-Hard 236S~S > 66 > 2P > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 168 / 170

For the double hit both on midscreen and corner routes, you need to space right above Johnny's feet so Zekkei will land into his hurtbox.The 1-Hit route needs to be dashed in deep, otherwise the follow-up of Zekkei, 546P~K, will whiff.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag.

Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

c.S f.S 2H(1) c.S c.S 2S 2H(1) 2S 6K(1) 5K 2S 5K 2H 2P 2PP c.S f.S 2H(1) | Everywhere Medium 4 / 6HS > RRC > 22X > c.S > f.S > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 200

A delay of c.S and Zekkei is needed for the combo to work.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. c.S | Everywhere Medium 4 / 6HS > RRC > 22X > c.S > f.S > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 195 / 198

For fullscreen 2-Hit and corner 1-Hit, no delay is needed, no delay Zekkei. For corner 2-Hit, you need to delay c.S, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. c.S 2H 2H(1) | Everywhere Medium 4 / 6HS > RRC > 22X > c.S > f.S > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 197

A delay of c.S is needed. No delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2S | Everywhere Medium 4 / 6HS > RRC > 22X > 2S > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 193 / 196

For fullscreen, hit 2S as soon as possible, no delay Zekkei. Corner delay 2S a bit, no delay Zekkei. Corner 1-Hit no delay 2S. In case it is delayed, go for 2-Hit route instead. a tiny bit, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 6K(1) | Everywhere Medium 4 / 6HS > RRC > 22X > 6K(1) > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 185 / 188

For fullscreen and Corner, hit 6K(1) as soon as possible, no delay Zekkei. Corner 1-Hit delay 6K(1) a tiny bit, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 5K | Everywhere Medium 4 / 6HS > RRC > 22X > 5K > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 182 / 185

For fullscreen, no delay required, if delayed, delay Zekkei. Corner, no delay, no delay Zekkei.Fullscreen 1-Hit, delay P~K a bit so Johnny gets low making sure he goes into the corner for extension and corner carry. Corner 1-Hit, no delay Zekkei is required but can work.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2S 5K 2H | Everywhere Medium 4 / 6HS > RRC > 22X > c.S > 5K > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 181 / 185

For fullscreen and Corner, no delay required, if delayed, delay Zekkei.Fullscreen 1-Hit, hit 2S as soon as possible, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2P | Everywhere Medium 4 / 6HS > RRC > 22X > 2P > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 177 / 180

For fullscreen, press 2P as soon as possible, delay Zekkei.Corner 1 and 2-Hit, delay 2P a bit, no delay Zekkei.Fullscreen 1-Hit, press 2P as soon as possible, no delay Zekkei, delay 236S~S a bit otherwise Johnny will go the other way after HS Puff.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2PP | Everywhere Medium 4 / 6HS > RRC > 22X > c.S > 5K > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 181 / 185

For fullscreen, delay 2PP a bit, delay 236S into S a bit so Jam will move a bit more forward catching Johnny. Corner, delay 2PP almost hitting the ground, delay Zekkei a bit.For both fullscreen and corner 1-Hit, a tiny delay 2PP, delay Zekkei a bit.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag.

Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

j.PKS j.PPKS 6P(1) Extension j.PKS | Everywhere Hard f.S > 956 > j.PKS > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > (Card) / 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 165 / 200

For fullscreen, delay j.P,K,S and delay Zekkei. Can't get 66 > 2S for fullscreen 2-Hit, card charge is adviced instead. A combo extension would be f.S > TK Ryuujin into a charged card.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. j.PPKS | Everywhere Hard f.S > 956 > j.PPKS > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > (Card) / 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 160 / 158

For fullscreen, delay Zekkei a bit more, will OTG after HS Puffball.For the fullscreen 1-Hit and corner route, you need to delay j.K and/or j.S to have Johnny low to the ground, delay Zekkei a bit.Can't get 66 > 2S, card charge is adviced instead, this counts for every route. A combo extension would be f.S > TK Ryuujin into a charged card.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 6P(1) | Everywhere Medium-Hard f.S > 956 > j.PPKS > 6P(1) > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 22X

Damage: 156

Fullscreen, delay Zekkei.For the corner route, delay j.S a bit, delay Zekkei.Can't get 66 > 2S, card charge is adviced instead, this counts for every route. A combo extension would be f.S > TK Ryuujin into a charged card.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. Extension | Everywhere Medium-Hard ... > 2369K > Carded Move

Damage: 186

Example video of TK Ryuujin combo extenstion.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag.

Ordered from most damaging routes to least damaging.

c.S 2S 6P(1) 6K(1) 2S 5K 2H(1) 5K 2K 2P 2PP c.S | Everywhere Medium 2D > RRC > 66 > c.S > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 177

Fullscreen, dash in as deep as possible, that way you get lot of corner carry and puff stays in the corner, no delay Zekkei.For corner, you have to delay Zekkei a bit. Fullscreen 1-Hit, Fast c.S hit, will throw Johnny the other way of the screen. Corner 1-Hit, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2S | Everywhere Medium 2D > RRC > 66 > 2S > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 177

Fullscreen, dash in as deep as possible, that way you get lot of corner carry and puff stays in the corner, no delay Zekkei.Corner, delay Zekkei a bit.Fullscreen 1-hit, fast 2S hit, will throw Johnny the other way of the screen. Corner 1-Hit, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 6P(1) | Corner Medium 2D > RRC > 66 > 6P(1) > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 171

No delay required. Note: this route is Corner only.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 6K(1) | Everywhere Medium 2D > RRC > 66 > 6K(1) > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 170

Fullscreen both 2 and 1-Hit, fast 6K(1) hit, no delay Zekkei, will throw Johnny the other way of the screen.For corner, don't dash too far, space it so you will hit Johnny's feet with Zekkei. Corner 1-Hit, needs a deep dash for the route to work.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2S 5K 2H(1) | Everywhere Medium 2D > RRC > 66 > 2S > 2H(1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 168

Fullscreen, dash in as deep as possible, that way you get lot of corner carry and puff stays in the corner, delay Zekkei a bit.For corner, you have to delay Zekkei a bit.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 5K | Everywhere Medium 2D > RRC > 66 > 5K > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 167

Fullscreen, dash in as deep as possible, that way you get lot of corner carry and puff stays in the corner, no delay Zekkei.Corner, you have to delay Zekkei a bit. Fullscreen 1-Hit needs a fast 5K hit, no delay Zekkei, fullscreen will throw Johnny the other way of the screen. Corner 1-Hit also needs a fast 5K hit, however, don't dash in too deep, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2K | Everywhere Medium 2D > RRC > 66 > 2K > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 164

Fullscreen, dash in as deep as possible, that way you get lot of corner carry and puff stays in the corner, no delay Zekkei.Corner, no delay Zekkei. Corner 1-Hit, dash in deep, no delay Zekkei.

YouTube Local Video Your browser does not support the video tag. 2P | Everywhere Medium 2D > RRC > 66 > 2P > 2H / (1) > 546P~K > 236S~S~H > 66 > 2S > 2H > ender (546PP / 236236H~P)

Damage: 163

Fullscreen, dash in as deep as possible, that way you get lot of corner carry and puff stays in the corner, no delay Zekkei.Corner, delay and without Zekkei works both. Fullscreen and corner 1-Hit, dash in a bit, no delay Zekkei.

Fullscreen, dash in as deep as possible, that way you get lot of corner carry and puff stays in the corner, no delay Zekkei.Corner, no delay Zekkei. Corner 1-Hit, dash in deep, no delay Zekkei.

Delay 5K to c.S with a minimum of 2F and a maximum of 5F.

5K > 5P into c.S routing.

Only route so far that won't OTG after PuffPuff

Low j.D / (1) route into 2H / (1). Use 1-Hit 2H if you're fullscreen. you can do 2-Hit when you're near the corner. The damage stays the same, but you will get more hits.

docs.title: PK List
docs.text:
Document PK Combo

Routes are standard showing only max 2 routes per character. This is to prevent a lot of scrolling and an overwhelming look. You can simply press on a character's name to view all routes and press again to toggle back.

docs.title: Macro Rendering Error
docs.text:
File: standard_combos/standard.md

TemplateNotFound: /combos/pages/standard_combos/standard.html

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/mkdocs_macros/plugin.py", line 527, in render
    return md_template.render(**page_variables)
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/jinja2/environment.py", line 1301, in render
    self.environment.handle_exception()
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/jinja2/environment.py", line 936, in handle_exception
    raise rewrite_traceback_stack(source=source)
  File "<template>", line 6, in top-level template code
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/jinja2/loaders.py", line 218, in get_source
    raise TemplateNotFound(template)
jinja2.exceptions.TemplateNotFound: /combos/pages/standard_combos/standard.html
